## Learning Objectives

By the end of this course, you will be able to:

- Understand how GDP is measured and what it tells us about economic health
- Explain the relationship between inflation, unemployment, and economic growth
- Analyze fiscal policy tools and their economic effects
- Evaluate monetary policy and the Federal Reserve's role
- Understand international economic relationships and exchange rates
- Apply macroeconomic analysis to current economic events
